title: [Good]  eBay has an email for reporting eBay-related spam or spoof emails

tosdr.case: [Good]  eBay has an email for reporting eBay-related spam or spoof emails -good-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Good]  eBay has an email for reporting eBay-related spam or spoof emails (unwanted or threatening email and text messages) received as a result of purchased transactions.  (spam@ebay.com or spoof@ebay.com).
